    Into the Future

  • You're just going to have to wait, you know. In the meantime, checkout: Riot, Riot Rails, Jubilator, Inquisition, or just google for some random images (not helping with that).

Blurp! The following are just random thoughts, phrases, works, whatever that just pop into my head and I don't want to lose or bother my twittr pals with. See how nice I am?

  • Happiness is something you are, not something you obtain
  • If I could do one thing and I could do it well, it would be paper machet
  • I'll give you a jack in the box
  • Well ... your mom understands
